cn.title: 比特派机房停机维护通知

message.data: 比特派机房设备将于北京时间 2018 年 10 月 22 日晚 23:00 点整停机维护，停机期间派钱包收、发币，交易所交易功能正常、派银行充值正常，应用内以下功能受到影响：
1.一键买卖将于 10 月 22 日 23:00 关闭
2.停机期间派银行提币不会及时到账，机房正常运作后会陆续为您发币 整个停机过程预计 4 小时，请您提前做好相关规划，感谢您的理解与支持。

Bitpie 社群：
新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“比特派钱包”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1
The server maintenance will be performed from 11:00 p.m. October 22, 2018 to 3:00 a.m. October 23, 2018(UTC+8). During the maintenance, please be noted the following functions will be affected:
1.Instant Trade will be closed at 23:00 October 22nd,2018;

2.The withdrawal function of Pie Bank will not work during the maintenance and resume after the server operation recovers.However, the receiving and sending, ExPie exchange and deposit function of Pie Bank will remain working.
Thank you for your understanding and support.

Find us on
Telegram：t.me/BitpieInternational
Twitter：twitter.com/BitpieWallet
Medium: https://medium.com/@Bitpie
